results.title: BRASH Syndrome: A Case Report
results.text_hl: A 76-year-old man with @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@chronic kidney disease@@@ stage 3, essential @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @DISEASE_Psoriasis @DISEASE_MESH:D011565 @@@psoriasis@@@, and receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ presented to the Emergency Department with @DISEASE_Lethargy @DISEASE_MESH:D053609 @@@lethargy@@@ and @DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@weakness@@@ that started 3 days ago, with rapid deterioration into @DISEASE_Shock @DISEASE_MESH:D012769 @@@shock@@@.

citations.NLM: Bailuni Neto JJ, Siqueira BL, Machado FC, Boros GAB, Akamine MAV, Cordeiro de Paula LJ, Rodrigues de Assis AC, Soares PR, Scudeler TL. BRASH Syndrome: A Case Report Am J Case Rep. 2022 Jan 21;23():e934600. PMID: 35058422
citations.BibTeX: @article{35058422, title={BRASH Syndrome: A Case Report}, author={Bailuni Neto JJ and Siqueira BL and Machado FC and Boros GAB and Akamine MAV and Cordeiro de Paula LJ and Rodrigues de Assis AC and Soares PR and Scudeler TL}, journal={Am J Case Rep}, volume={23}, pages={e934600}}

results.title: [Efficacy of the combination of nicardipine-enalapril and atenolol in severe hypertension secondary to chronic renal disease].
results.text_hl: [Efficacy of the combination of @CHEMICAL_Nicardipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009529 @@@nicardipine@@@-@CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ in severe @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ secondary to @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@chronic renal disease@@@].

citations.NLM: Melina D, Guerrera G, Santoliquido A, Guerrera C, Musumeci V, Nicolò G, Cataldo R. [Efficacy of the combination of nicardipine-enalapril and atenolol in severe hypertension secondary to chronic renal disease]. Ann Cardiol Angeiol (Paris). 1992 Jun;41(6):351-3. PMID: 1444161
citations.BibTeX: @article{1444161, title={[Efficacy of the combination of nicardipine-enalapril and atenolol in severe hypertension secondary to chronic renal disease].}, author={Melina D and Guerrera G and Santoliquido A and Guerrera C and Musumeci V and Nicolò G and Cataldo R}, journal={Ann Cardiol Angeiol (Paris)}, volume={41}, number={6}, pages={351-3}}

results.title: Pharmacological and Non Pharmacological Strategies in the Management of Coronary Artery Disease and Chronic Kidney Disease
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@, acetbutolol and @CHEMICAL_Nadolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009248 @@@nadolol@@@ may require dose adjustments in @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@CKD@@@.

citations.NLM: Agrawal H, Aggarwal K, Littrell R, Velagapudi P, Turagam MK, Mittal M, Alpert MA. Pharmacological and Non Pharmacological Strategies in the Management of Coronary Artery Disease and Chronic Kidney Disease Curr Cardiol Rev. 2015;11(3):261-9. PMID: 25981315
citations.BibTeX: @article{25981315, title={Pharmacological and Non Pharmacological Strategies in the Management of Coronary Artery Disease and Chronic Kidney Disease}, author={Agrawal H and Aggarwal K and Littrell R and Velagapudi P and Turagam MK and Mittal M and Alpert MA}, journal={Curr Cardiol Rev}, volume={11}, number={3}, pages={261-9}}

results.title: [Effect of the long-term atenolol therapy on the structural and functional parameters of the left ventricle in patients with dilated cardiomyopathy].
results.text_hl: The contractility parameters (ejection fraction and delta S) increased in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ of all @DISEASE_Conversion_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003291 @@@functional@@@ classes but more markedly in those of @DISEASE_Conversion_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003291 @@@functional@@@ classes I and II. The effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on the transmitral diastolic flow in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with the initial stages of @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@chronic circulatory insufficiency@@@ was characterized by the absence of changes in the flow rate during the period of rapid filling and a significant lowering of the atrial peak, which corresponded to improvement in the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@' status.

citations.NLM: Sisakian AS. [Effect of the long-term atenolol therapy on the structural and functional parameters of the left ventricle in patients with dilated cardiomyopathy]. Eksp Klin Farmakol. 1997 Nov-Dec;60(6):17-20. PMID: 9460590
citations.BibTeX: @article{9460590, title={[Effect of the long-term atenolol therapy on the structural and functional parameters of the left ventricle in patients with dilated cardiomyopathy].}, author={Sisakian AS}, journal={Eksp Klin Farmakol}, volume={60}, number={6}, pages={17-20}}

results.title: Impact of achieved systolic blood pressure on renal function in hypertensive patients.
results.journal: Eur Heart J Qual Care Clin Outcomes
results.text_hl: Although high BP at baseline is associated with greater progression of @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@chronic kidney disease@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@CKD@@@), randomized trials in @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@CKD@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ have found no significant relationship between more intensive BP control and glomerular filtration rate (GFR) decline.

citations.NLM: Okin PM, Kjeldsen SE, Devereux RB. Impact of achieved systolic blood pressure on renal function in hypertensive patients. Eur Heart J Qual Care Clin Outcomes. 2016 Oct 1;2(4):271-276. PMID: 29474712
citations.BibTeX: @article{29474712, title={Impact of achieved systolic blood pressure on renal function in hypertensive patients.}, author={Okin PM and Kjeldsen SE and Devereux RB}, journal={Eur Heart J Qual Care Clin Outcomes}, volume={2}, number={4}, pages={271-276}}
